parameter.name: datacontrolsvisibility
parameter.help: Controls the datapath of this window. If true, the datapath associated with the window will cause the window to be invisible if it matches no data or visible if it does match data, overriding whatever had been set as the visible attribute of the window. Default: false.

parameter.name: haswindowfocus
parameter.help: True if the window is frontmost, default: false.

parameter.name: minheight
parameter.help: Minimum height for the window, default: 50.

parameter.name: minwidth
parameter.help: Minimum width for the windowy, default: 60.

parameter.name: state
parameter.help: The state of the window: 1=selected (frontmost) window, 2=not-selected window, 3=dragging, 4=disabled, 5=resizing. Default: 1
